string.value: Go talk to #p2100001#. He says to shush about the nonsense of #o3220001# being a monster. It will take more than words to convince him. Perhaps #b1 bottle of the #t4011008##k that #p2100001# likes might help the conversation. \n\n#i4011008##t4011008# #b#c4011008#/1
You have successfully convinced #p2100001#! He is infamous for being stubborn... Sweet! Report to #p2101010#.
Are you here to make an item? Huh? #o3220001#? You're not here to spout that nonsense about #o3220001# being a monster, are you?

#o3220001#? A monster, huh? What an absurd thing to say! How dare you speak of the guardian of the desert that way! Sheesh, no respect. If you're going to believe that nonsense, get out of here! I have nothing to say to you! How dare you come #bempty-handed#k and...
What a relief. I've been rather irritable because people keep spewing that ridiculous nonsense about #o3220001# being a monster.
